main event: Two unidentified aerial lights were observed hovering or moving slowly above the clouds in Dayton, Ohio on 15 July 1959.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for at least 15 minutes and involved two objects,The lights were described as golden yellow or amber in color with little or no change in illumination,There was no observed trail or beam of light from the objects,The objects were noted to be hovering or moving very slowly,The report indicated that the observer was advised to provide more information for scientific investigation.
sighted object: two aerial lights of unknown origin
witness description: The witness reported seeing the lights alone, with no additional information on other potential witnesses provided.
